title: This Week's Top Stories - Andrew Cuomo's Scandals Mount, Catholic Church Reparations & Kentucky Cops
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Andrew Cuomo's Scandals Mount, Catholic Church Reparations & Kentucky Cops
description:
Several more women accuse Governor Andrew Cuomo of sexual harassment, the Catholic Church pledges $100 million for reparations, and Kentucky considers criminalizing police-taunting.
